alert.note: Alert for Missoula, Bitterroot Valleys (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 10 at 1:13PM MST until January 12 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE THURSDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations between 3 and 5 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 40 mph. The combination of snow, wind, and cold temperatures make this a potentially dangerous situation for people and animals. * WHERE...Missoula and Bitterroot Valley. * WHEN...From Thursday afternoon through late Thursday night. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday evening commute.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
